front.title: A Simplified Scalable ELAN Service Model with Segment Routing Underlay

abstract.t: This document proposes a new approach for realizing Ethernet LAN (ELAN) services with an objective of leveraging Segment Routing Control plane to achieve high scalability, faster network convergence, and reduced operational complexity. Furthermore, it naturally brings the benefits of All-Active multihoming as well as MAC learning in data-plane.
